original_text: You will have all the land from the desert in the south to the Lebanon mountains in the north. It will be from the river Euphrates to the Mediterranean Sea on the west. You will have all the land of the Hittite people.
korean_text: 곧 광야와 이 레바논에서부터 큰 강 곧 유브라데 강까지 헷 족속의 온 땅과 또 해 지는 쪽 대해까지 너희의 영토가 되리라

sentences.original_text: You will have all the land
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 모든 땅을 가지게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: from the desert in the south
to the Lebanon mountains in the north
It will be from the river Euphrates
to the Mediterranean Sea on the west
You will have all the land of the Hittite people
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 헷 족속의 모든 땅을 가지게 될 것이다
